6.7 Identifier reference

setAcceleratorTable

Function

The ML function setAcceleratorTable corresponds to the Windows function CopyAcceleratorTable. It has the following type: 
val setAcceleratorTable : accelerator_table -> unit
The function setAcceleratorTable preforms the equivalent action that the Windows command CopyAcceleratorTable(table,NULL,00, and the resulting table is stored for future reference.
